title: Advanced Fairness At The Marathon
description: Four lessons for creating fairness from a big race in New York. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Advanced Fairness At The Marathon
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: With limited slots and high demand, the NYC Marathon has had to create a clever system to allocate a scarce resource as fairly as possible. Four lessons in fair allocation.
itunes:subtitle: With limited slots and high demand, the NYC Marathon has had to create a clever system to allocate a scarce resource as fairly as possible. Four lessons in fair allocation.
